content: भः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the planet Venus. {@--2@} Error, delusion, mere semblance. {@--3@} An epithet of Śukra. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> given to the base of nouns before the vowel terminations beginning with accusative plural; <ab>cf.</ab> अंग and पद. --भं {@--1@} A star. {@--2@} A lunar mansion or asterism. {@--3@} A planet. {@--4@} A sign of the zodiac. {@--5@} The number twenty-seven. {@--6@} A bee
